connector.description: Perform caching operations using Caffeine Cache with an attached CacheLoader.

camel.sink.endpoint.action.name: camel.sink.endpoint.action
camel.sink.endpoint.action.description: To configure the default cache action. If an action is set in the message header, then the operation from the header takes precedence.

camel.sink.endpoint.cacheLoader.name: camel.sink.endpoint.cacheLoader
camel.sink.endpoint.cacheLoader.description: To configure a CacheLoader in case of a LoadCache use

camel.sink.endpoint.createCacheIfNotExis.name: camel.sink.endpoint.createCacheIfNotExist
camel.sink.endpoint.createCacheIfNotExis.description: Configure if a cache need to be created if it does exist or can't be pre-configured.

camel.sink.endpoint.evictionType.name: camel.sink.endpoint.evictionType
camel.sink.endpoint.evictionType.description: Set the eviction Type for this cache One of: [size_based] [time_based]

camel.sink.endpoint.expireAfterAccessTim.name: camel.sink.endpoint.expireAfterAccessTime
camel.sink.endpoint.expireAfterAccessTim.description: Set the expire After Access Time in case of time based Eviction (in seconds)

camel.sink.endpoint.expireAfterWriteTime.name: camel.sink.endpoint.expireAfterWriteTime
camel.sink.endpoint.expireAfterWriteTime.description: Set the expire After Access Write in case of time based Eviction (in seconds)

camel.sink.endpoint.initialCapacity.name: camel.sink.endpoint.initialCapacity
camel.sink.endpoint.initialCapacity.description: Set the initial Capacity for the cache

camel.sink.endpoint.key.name: camel.sink.endpoint.key
camel.sink.endpoint.key.description: To configure the default action key. If a key is set in the message header, then the key from the header takes precedence.

camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer
camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.sink.endpoint.maximumSize.name: camel.sink.endpoint.maximumSize
camel.sink.endpoint.maximumSize.description: Set the maximum size for the cache

camel.sink.endpoint.removalListener.name: camel.sink.endpoint.removalListener
camel.sink.endpoint.removalListener.description: Set a specific removal Listener for the cache

camel.sink.endpoint.statsCounter.name: camel.sink.endpoint.statsCounter
camel.sink.endpoint.statsCounter.description: Set a specific Stats Counter for the cache stats

camel.sink.endpoint.statsEnabled.name: camel.sink.endpoint.statsEnabled
camel.sink.endpoint.statsEnabled.description: To enable stats on the cache

camel.sink.endpoint.keyType.name: camel.sink.endpoint.keyType
camel.sink.endpoint.keyType.description: The cache key type, default java.lang.Object

camel.sink.endpoint.valueType.name: camel.sink.endpoint.valueType
camel.sink.endpoint.valueType.description: The cache value type, default java.lang.Object

camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.actio.name: camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.action
camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.actio.description: To configure the default cache action. If an action is set in the message header, then the operation from the header takes precedence.

camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.cache.name: camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.cacheLoader
camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.cache.description: To configure a CacheLoader in case of a LoadCache use

camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.creat.name: camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.createCacheIfNotExist
camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.creat.description: Configure if a cache need to be created if it does exist or can't be pre-configured.

camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.evict.name: camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.evictionType
camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.evict.description: Set the eviction Type for this cache One of: [size_based] [time_based]

camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.expir.name: camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.expireAfterAccessTime
camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.expir.description: Set the expire After Access Time in case of time based Eviction (in seconds)

camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.expir.name: camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.expireAfterWriteTime
camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.expir.description: Set the expire After Access Write in case of time based Eviction (in seconds)

camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.initi.name: camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.initialCapacity
camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.initi.description: Set the initial Capacity for the cache

camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.key.name: camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.key
camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.key.description: To configure the default action key. If a key is set in the message header, then the key from the header takes precedence.

camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.lazyS.name: camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.lazyStartProducer
camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.lazyS.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.maxim.name: camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.maximumSize
camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.maxim.description: Set the maximum size for the cache

camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.remov.name: camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.removalListener
camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.remov.description: Set a specific removal Listener for the cache

camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.stats.name: camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.statsCounter
camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.stats.description: Set a specific Stats Counter for the cache stats

camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.stats.name: camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.statsEnabled
camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.stats.description: To enable stats on the cache

camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.autow.name: camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.autowiredEnabled
camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.autow.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.keyTy.name: camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.keyType
camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.keyTy.description: The cache key type, default java.lang.Object

camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.value.name: camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.valueType
camel.component.caffeine-loadcache.value.description: The cache value type, default java.lang.Object
